about_the_game:
The epic and haunting music of The Lost Legends of Redwall™: The Scout Anthology is now available in this official soundtrack.

This Soundtrack includes all 42 original tunes from the game, plus 6 bonus tracks, in .MP3 format.

Tracks:


Act 1
  • Martin's Jig by James Marantette
  • Scurrying About by Keith Medley
  • Breaking Bread by Keith Medley
  • Hotroot Sunsalad by James Marantette
  • Warmed Hayberry Cordial by James Marantette
  • Dandelion and Burdock by James Marantette
  • Festive by Keith Medley
  • Joyful Hope by Keith Medley
  • Quince Pie, Oh My! by James Marantette
  • The Approach by James Marantette
  • I Smell Sauerkraut by James Marantette
  • Oh Rats! by James Marantette
  • A Vile Slobber by James Marantette
  • The Chase by James Marantette
  • Cutscene Medley by James Marantette
  • My Home, My Holt, Music by Keith Medley and James Marantette, vocals by Bill Russell
  • Gatehouse by Seth Stanley
  • Snowglobe by Seth Stanley
  • Sea Rats by Keith Medley
  • Fear and Courage by Keith Medley
  • Sandals in the Abbey by Keith Medley
  • Media Vita by The Veritas Choir and Sally Mehler
  • A New Adventure Written by James Marantette

Act 2
  • Beneath the Lighthouse Written by James Marantette and Keith Medly
  • Lilygrove Burns Written by James Marantette
  • An Intimate Conversation Written by James Marantette and Keith Medly
  • Old Moss Creek Written by Keith Medly and James Marantette
  • Liam and Sophia Written by Keith Medly and James Marantette
  • The Captain Written by James Marantette
  • Sneaking About Written by James Marantette
  • Outsmarting Cheesethief Written by James Marantette and Keith Medly
  • Pantry Raid Written by James Marantette
  • Run for your life Written by James Marantette
  • Stoats! Written by James Marantette
  • Gathered 'Round the Table Written by James Marantette

Act 3
  • Where's the Ginko? Written by James Marantette
  • A Glorious Feast Written by James Marantette
  • Rats and Rafters Written by James Marantette
  • Mila Written by James Marantette
  • Rodents of Unusual Size Written by James Marantette
  • Too Many Puzzles Written by James Marantette
  • A Feast for Rats Written by James Marantette
  • Ain't Got Time for Grooming Written by James Marantette, Sung by James Marantette
  • Betrayal Written by James Marantette
  • Meeting an Old Friend Written by James Marantette
  • Mila's Fear Written by James Marantette
  • Within These Walls Written by James Marantette, Sung by Nolan Lynch
  • Badger Lord Lament Written by Nolan Lynch and James Marantette, Sung by Nolan Lynch
